path_to_world: Path to your world folder (e.g. C:/.minecraft/saves/world)

ADVANCEMENTS_SHEET.name: Sheet Name on Google Sheets (e.g. Advancements)
ADVANCEMENTS_SHEET.id_range: Range of cells with the full path of the advancement (e.g. D2:D)
ADVANCEMENTS_SHEET.status_range: Range of cells with the true/false progress of the advancement (e.g. H2:H)
ADVANCEMENTS_SHEET.who_range: Range of cells where the player who did the advancement is listed (e.g. F2:F)
ADVANCEMENTS_SHEET.when_range: Range of cells for the timestamp (e.g. E2:E)
ADVANCEMENTS_SHEET.progress_range: Range of cells where the sub-progress is tracked (e.g. G2:G)
ADVANCEMENTS_SHEET.incomplete_range: Range of cells where the incomplete criteria is listed (e.g. H2:H)

ITEMS_SHEET.name: Sheet Name on Google Sheets (e.g. All Items/Blocks)
ITEMS_SHEET.id_range: Range of cells with the full path of the item (e.g. E2:E)
ITEMS_SHEET.status_range: Range of cells with the true/false progress of the advancement (e.g. C2:C)
ITEMS_SHEET.who_range: Range of cells where the player who did the advancement is listed (e.g. A2:A)
